titles.title: Keep the Promise Act of 2015
A bill to prohibit gaming activities on certain Indian land in Arizona until the expiration of certain gaming compacts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

bill.summary:
1/13/2015--Introduced. Keep the Promise Act of 2015
Restricts gaming on land within the Phoenix, Arizona, metropolitan area acquired by the Secretary of the Interior in trust for the benefit of an Indian tribe after April 9, 2013. Terminates the restriction on January 1, 2027.
